channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Simple JWT Login
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Simple JWT Login

item.title: CVE-2021-24998|2024-08-03T19:49:14.542Z -- unknown -- simple%20jwt%20login
item.description: The Simple JWT Login WordPress plugin before 3.3.0 can be used to create new WordPress user accounts with a randomly generated password. The password is generated using the str_shuffle PHP function that "does not generate cryptographically secure values, and should not be used for cryptographic purposes" according to PHP's documentation.
